author: MSNBC.com
title: Democrats criticize Pentagon's decision to divert funding for Trump's wall
description: The Pentagon plans to shift 3.8 billion in military funding to the construction of President Trump’s border wall. Alexa Liautaud reports on the backlash the decision is facing.
source.name: MSNBC

title: American passengers prepare to evacuate from cruise ship in Japan
description: NBC News' Janis Mackey Frayer reports from Yokohama, Japan, as Americans prepare to evacuate the virus-infected Diamond Princess cruise ship.

title: Trump's Futile Approach to Black Voters
description: In this week's memo, Rev. Al Sharpton dispels all of Trump's attempts to garner the Black vote. Sharpton also dares Trump to convince Black voters to forget about all of his injustices.

title: Co-author of ‘How Democracies Die’: The problem is Republicans

title: Trump gives 'start your engines' command as grand marshal at Daytona 500
description: President Trump delivered the famous “start your engines” command to drivers at Daytona 500 in Florida. The event is the first of many to come where the president is looking to steal some of the spotlight from Democrats ahead of the Nevada caucus.
